resources.string:
RiverFerry shows the next available RiverFerry.
Right now the app is configure for the RiverFerries (fr=BAC) of the Seine-Maritime french "departement". You can modify the "SDCARD/riverferry/schedules.tsv" file and delete its associated file "schedules.tsv.bin" to changes the stations and departure times.

The app is open-source and code is available at 
http://github.com/mdecorde/BAC76
Default file is "schedules.tsv", you can choose another name and your TSV file in the "riverferry" folder of you SDcard
Enter the default ferry station name

**General**

The 2 top Lists are respectivily the left bank stations and the right bank stations.
Select one station to update the 3 bottom lists and the next departure time.
The grey list contains the schedule of the selected station. The 2 other list are the preivous and next stations schedules.

**Settings**

Refresh: refresh the next departure time
Settings: allow to change the source file of the stations+schedules and to set a default station
Help: show this screen
About: Show general informations.
The riverboat of the "La Bouille" french town
